short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts the overall tweets you have read

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The primary feature of Tweet Counter is to help you stay within the 600 tweet limit imposed by Twitter. As you browse your feed, the extension keeps a real-time tally of the tweets you've seen. This simple but effective badge counter keeps you informed, allowing you to gauge your progress and avoid exceeding the tweet limit.
